documents.document: Describing the 'Special Relationship' Trump says "my mother was Scottish you know?" Oh you mean an immigrant? One generation. Shameful.
Even major brands are trolling The Donald. Well done, @Dove https://t.co/VFjTljYCdl
@markrae the triumphs and tragedies of love.
@markrae did Marlon Dingle sleep with Cristiano Ronaldo? Well well well.

My favourite Burns song. https://t.co/M2jZehdlhQ
Enjoy your supper (@MacsweenHaggis the natural choice, of course)
A great start to the day to see @NicolaSturgeon meeting student nurses at @EdinburghNapier https://t.co/GFupKP5mO1
Great evening at @ccfest seeing, among others, @olivianj @bncmusic and @amysky on @themarkrad #BBCRadio2 folk show. https://t.co/g7m150RRZz
Right. Well then. I want a drone. My friend took this yesterday. https://t.co/UEBSALchZ2
@piersmorgan only weak men fear strong women, you thundering, relentless, unstoppable moron.
Survived Sgor Gaoith despite freezing fog and new walking boots. Visibility: POOR. https://t.co/GBiZNxMv1a
@MrBarberella I did half and half! Almost broke the new ones in, but they also almost broke me too!
Bombing down the A9, three of us BOOMING along 'Together in Electric Dreams'. This is the dream.
My new walking boots hurt my feet between the bedroom and the kitchen. Not looking great for this hill walk. Tally Ho!
Unable to watch any of the inaugurtion. Living in denial for four years. See you then, then.
This will be the year I learn Gaelic.
My mum thought La la Land was 'ok'. Going to request a DNA test.
Pirate costume purchased. Fancy dress PANIC. Hen do incoming February. Aviemore beware.
@ProducerMac almost as good as your real life repartee
@ProducerMac proud of you, John.
I shall save May's speech for later, when I have the strength to deal with her. Somewhere in 2022 looking likely.
@petepaphides @sohoradio Downtown by Petula Clark. Particularly because of the key change immediately before.
@wooshevents @graemeeaston @keitheaston excellent work, chaps! See/hear you at Murrayfield ðŸ‰
@MartinDewar there is no judgement here. None at all.
@MartinDewar I recommend my personal favourite lunchtime pick me up - a jaegerbomb.
@MartinDewar resistance is futile... double shot latte, is my advice.
@SallyMunners SENSATIONAL. Blubbed at the end, what a glorious film
@cabowick absolutely perfect. I would have watched it again straight away, it was gorgeous.
Exciting times - off to La La Land shortly. Will it join Moulin Rogue, Sunshine on Leith and Sing Street as all-time fave musi-films?
@MrBarberella I do have one, just worried I am not paying enough but instead spending it on holidays and Malbec.
Suddenly having a very real panic about my pension plans.
@AdamTheGuzzler #ferrylolz Amjad. Tell me, did you try the Oaties?
You don't need an email alert when you have a Calum MacSween. Sent from iPhone - yes. Boat emoji use - approved. Caâ€¦ https://t.co/JtXyrGLnr2
PRETTY low on will-power at the moment. If anyone has any spare, just pop it in the post. Thanks now.
@keitheaston alphabetical by artist and then within that by release date?
This woman writes GREAT POP. Can I be her when I grow up please? https://t.co/GRFSv03kWa
Having my annual wave of panic that I have neglected Celtic Connections to my eternal detriment.
@thelause Terry's Chocolate Orange related, actually. Refrigerated chocolate proving my downfall.
Chipped a tooth last night. Called dentist - open on Sundays - and it will be fixed on Tuesday. I love the #nhs
DISASTROUS oversight. Missed out Buble. https://t.co/HB9Zjzlicc
@KDBingo I do not even know what you are referring to but the fact you have called an Archers character a bell-end has truly made my day
@keitheaston I am hoping to sign up to Edinburgh Uni nightclasses so I can give you the essentials - swearing, ordering beers and the like.
@keitheaston Feasgar math, mo ghraidh
I just entered a parallel universe where @GaryBarlow joins @mrmichaelball and @AlfieBoe , thus forming the greatest boy-band of all time.
I gave up my telly over a year ago but I CANNOT RESIST THIS. #letitshine #GaryBarlow #takethat https://t.co/NTjotNFsk4
Nothing like a phone-call from an angry Nigerian parent to start your Saturday.

In trying to locate one of my Grandpa's old sermons online, I found obits from the Herald and this one.
https://t.co/xLBeisGJC7
#projectpop2017 planning underway. Under a duvet. With a cuppa and some Digestives.
Listening to 'Wichita Lineman' on my lunch break with some leftovers and a Diet Coke. This is as good a Friday as I could hope for.
@cabowick god, that is horrific
@eyetoons Hound Dog. Apparently. #playthattoon #eyetunes https://t.co/ZNKkvixFwP
@MartinDewar re-re-wind.
If you ever considered making a latte with almond milk, save yourself the horror. Indescribably bad.
Well @1StephGibson & I just did @kayla_itsines 'legs' day for the first time at the gym. Safe to say my mobility is permanently changed.
2.5 hours in the hairdressers so far. This is where I will die.
'Viva Forever' by the Spice Girls just came on the radio at the hairdressers and it's taking ALL my strength not to BOOM along.
And then, the Highlanders stirred, and in their natural habitat the familiar sound of the kettle boiling woke the tired children.
Getting heat from my Mum around the entire concept of 'Cards Against Humanity', as if it was entirely my invention.
So far this week I have broken two iPhone screens, and my GHDs and boiler have stopped working. Christmas is cancelled.
@MartinDewar ELO a highlight. Jess Glynne's ELO.
@MartinDewar MacSween's Taxis now in full swing. Non-optional pop music soundtrack included FREE.
Trying to choose my fave track on the @delamitrinews #pastedbeyondrecognition album is like trying to choose my favourite niece or nephew.
Smashed iPhone screen outweighed by a magnificent roast pork roll from the Pompey markets - thank you @ICPstudents !
@simonmayo smashed iPhone screen
EXCELLENT customer service from @Bose - made my day.
@princesstiny Head Sheering and Hairy Styles?
@princesstiny #onedirectionlolz
I am going to open a hairdressers replicating boy band members' haircuts and call it 'Hairy Styles'
When your taxi is booked for 530am but you have five days of tweets to catch up on.
@Scotlandteam we managed to get you some new Scotland fans. https://t.co/3zjOXMlsU7
#backingblue #rugby7s #scottishrugby Come on, Boys! https://t.co/HwWcv33HvU
A life-affirming moment to see a venue full of people go nuts when @deaconbluemusic crank out 'Dignity'. New tunes are my faves though.
@SallyMunners fancy it? A sideline to the undertakers
@thelause you are going to feel VERY BAD if I get home later and that has actually happened
@thelause two things, Andrew. I 100% will never take technology advice from you and also, i remember your student digs. <ends>
I am considering a tattoo. 36 seems awfully young for a mid-life crisis
Please can someone go and do a nutritious food shop for me, change all bed sheets and heat the flat up before Tuesday? Great, thanks.
@CatrionaShearer taking a bullet for the team here, Cat. It's actually work though. HONESTLY.
@CatrionaShearer pal. Moscow Mules. Vodka, ginger beer, ginger and lime. I'll be right there
A broken toe so far for the #navitasconference after a dramatic skid across the bathroom floor. WELL DONE EVERYONE.
As with every deadline I loom large against, I have become obsessed with font sizes and formatting. And Twitter.
Only one man has this in his hands @neilbartley #kenforsanta2016 https://t.co/FiRXzBqS0k
Christmas Wrapping by the Waitresses was playing in Superdrug at the airport this morning. It's time. Christmas has officially started.
@cabowick my chat would have been diabolical. Man, that was early! Have a good trip too. See you for that coffee when I am back!
@OwlFiftyEight quick off the mark with the Hanoi puns. PLENTY more to come.
Playlists prepped but book in my hold luggage. 50% sorted for this trip. See you soon, Hanoi!
Also my taxi is booked for 440am so I feel murderous and Trump thoughts are not helping.
I am still not coping with the fact Trump won. Normal business will resume soon.
@redbusbistro do all tours start from the Bus Station?
"Your https://t.co/XB3ocQLzqB order of "Royal Family Masks (full set of 7) has been dispatched." #Navitas conference time is upon us.
@thelause you mean the KATZE.
@PeteRichardsSyd I can smell it from here. Or is that fear? I can never determine.
Trying to picture the scene of Trump and Merkel having a conversation about, well, anything. Just him yelling FALSCH at her over and over.
How can we trust a man who cannot run a comb through his hair to run a country?
Some light, in the dark. https://t.co/SmNM7F5Vn0
With Brexit people didn't understand the EU properly. It's impossible to misinterpret hate and the encouragement of inequality. #lastword
Also, this endorsement of misogyny - as well racism and xenophobia - invokes such fear and sadness that it almost feels futile to fight it.
Moderate solace in that there can be no worse candidate for the Republicans to put forward after Trump messes this up. #onetermtrump
Scared to sleep as there is a monster under my bed, and by monster I mean the possibility of a Wotsit leading the free world by dawn.
Obsessed with 'Two Way' by @KTTunstall and @JamesBayMusic - electro-country feels.
@iandommett a face for it, certainly.
